channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2016

item.title: CVE-2019-1137|2024-08-04T18:06:31.728Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202016
item.description: A cross-site-scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Exchange server, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1233|2024-08-04T18:13:29.652Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202016
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1266|2024-08-04T18:13:29.651Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202016
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server when Outlook Web App (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Spoofing Vulnerability'.
